sourceMeaningMnemonic: <radical>Imperial</radical> <radical>clothes</radical> allow you to perform an ancient <kanji>attack</kanji> that cannot be repelled.
meaningInfo: IMPERIAL ATTACK, GO! Imagine what this imperial attack might look like and imagine yourself in some swanky imperial clothes while you perform it.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>attack</kanji>'s power is concentrated in the <reading>shoe</reading>s (<ja>しゅう</ja>) in this imperial outfit. You attack with your feet, kicking the enemy with your old, fancy shoes.
readingInfo: Picture the shoes as you attack, they glow—full of attack power! These +4 attack shoes are really special.
